  • Spacious desktop offers plenty of space for your laptop, paperwork, and family photos while 3 drawers give you even more storage space for pens, pencils, scissors, and tape. Inset handles and X-shaped legs give the Desk a modern design
  • Complete your home office with more Better Homes and Gardens products (sold separately)
  • Desk ships flat to your door and requires assembly upon opening. 2 adults are recommended for assembly. Desktop can hold 70 lbs. and the large drawer will hold up to 10 lbs. while the 2 smaller drawers will hold 5 lbs. each.
  • Assembled dimensions: 30?H x 47.6?W x 19.7?D
